reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 385/96: JOINT HEALTH AND SAFETY COMMITTEES - EXEMPTION FROM REQUIREMENTS
reg_info.reg_name_text: JOINT HEALTH AND SAFETY COMMITTEES — EXEMPTION FROM REQUIREMENTS
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 385/96: JOINT HEALTH AND SAFETY COMMITTEES - EXEMPTION FROM REQUIREMENTS

content.content: 1. In this Regulation, “ordinary worker” does not include a participant in community participation under the Ontario Works Act, 1997; (“travailleur ordinaire”) “volunteer worker” means a worker who performs work or supplies a service but who receives no monetary compensation for doing so other than an allowance for expenses or an honorarium. (“travailleur bénévole”)  O. Reg. 385/96, s. 1; O. Reg. 131/98, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. In this Regulation,

“ordinary worker” does not include a participant in community participation under the Ontario Works Act, 1997; (“travailleur ordinaire”)

“volunteer worker” means a worker who performs work or supplies a service but who receives no monetary compensation for doing so other than an allowance for expenses or an honorarium. (“travailleur bénévole”)  O. Reg. 385/96, s. 1; O. Reg. 131/98, s. 1.

content.content: 2. A workplace at which fewer than 20 ordinary workers are regularly employed is exempted from clause 9 (2) (a) of the Act.  O. Reg. 385/96, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. A workplace at which fewer than 20 ordinary workers are regularly employed is exempted from clause 9 (2) (a) of the Act.  O. Reg. 385/96, s. 2.

content.content: 3. A project at which fewer than 20 ordinary workers are regularly employed is exempted from clause 9 (2) (c) of the Act.  O. Reg. 385/96, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. A project at which fewer than 20 ordinary workers are regularly employed is exempted from clause 9 (2) (c) of the Act.  O. Reg. 385/96, s. 3.

content.content: 4. The following workplaces are exempt from subsection 9 (12) of the Act: 1. A workplace at which fewer than 20 ordinary workers (who are not volunteer workers) are regularly employed. 2. A project at which fewer than 50 ordinary workers (who are not volunteer workers) are regularly employed.  O. Reg. 385/96, s. 4.
content.raw_html:
4. The following workplaces are exempt from subsection 9 (12) of the Act:

1. A workplace at which fewer than 20 ordinary workers (who are not volunteer workers) are regularly employed.

2. A project at which fewer than 50 ordinary workers (who are not volunteer workers) are regularly employed.  O. Reg. 385/96, s. 4.

content.content: 5. Omitted (revokes other Regulations).  O. Reg. 385/96, s. 5.
content.raw_html: 5. Omitted (revokes other Regulations).  O. Reg. 385/96, s. 5.

content.content: 6. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 385/96, s. 6.
content.raw_html: 6. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 385/96, s. 6.
